nodes.text: The Tribal Intelligence Depository was an archive in the city of Orreg on the planet Kesh that existed around 2974 BBY. It was maintained by the Lost Tribe of Sith, the descendants of a group of stranded Human Sith who had settled on Kesh following the Great Hyperspace War in 5000 BBY. The tribal intelligence depository was used to store intelligence on domestic enemies of the Tribe's leadership on the continent of Keshtah Minor. Prior to the banishment of the outcast Parlan Spinner, the Prefect of Police Takara Hilts deposited a detailed report on Spinner at the depository.
